recipe.preparation:
In a medium-hot pan, saute rosemary in olive oil until soft. Rub lamb chops with garlic salt and fry. When done, cover with foil and place in a warm pan.
Add additional rosemary and olive oil to the pan and fry hash browns in the "dirty' pan. Remove, drain and serve with lamb chops.
recipe.name: Post-Almanor Lamb Dinner
recipe.notes: Almanor is pretty much just eating and drinking for several days straight. The drive back along I5 is grueling and usually leaves on arriving at supper time with a good starve on while leaving one rather tired. This was a one-skillet meal that turned the tide of starvation quite nicely. (15 Aug 2004)
